 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַם‎</span>] **verb** ==spread or lay something over== (Late Hebrew ***id. form a crust***, so Hiph\`il <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יקרים על‎</span> [[Eccl.43.20|Eccl 43:20]] Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְרַם‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***incrust, overlay***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְקָרַמְתִּ֫י עֲלֵיכֶם עוֺר‎</span> [[Ezek.37.6|Ezek 37:6]] ***I will spread skin over you*** (i.e. the dry bones); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקְרַם עֲלֵיהֶם עוֺר‎</span> v[[Ezek.37.8|Ezek 37:8]] (so [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]]; [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקְרָם‎</span>, of which conflicting explanations [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:9u»§§ 9u</sup>, «GKC:29i»29i), indefinite subject instead of passive; but read **Niph\`al** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקָּ֫רֶם‎</span> [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] (compare [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]]) [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]].
